name: 英文（一）
comment: 教育學院、營養科學學位學程、音樂系、表演藝術學士學位學程、企管系、東亞系、華語系(應華組)、競技系一年級(能力分班)
restrict: ◎第一階段需人工加選◎第二階段需人工加選◎加退選階段需人工加選
description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
This course aims to develop students' English proficiency.  Students are expected to increase their reading and writing literacy along with listening comprehension and communication performance through a variety of in-class and out-of-class activities.

Course requirements

**1\. Textbook**

Keynote 4

**2\. Class Participation**

Punctual attendance in class is REQUIRED**.** Though you can learn from the readings, you can learn the most from interacting/practicing with others and actively participating in in-class activities. Your participation in class will be evaluated too. Absence from a class is no excuse for not knowing the assignments/exams and what has been covered in that class.

**3\. Lab Visits**

Every student must visit and make use of the labs this semester. 

**4\. Group Presentation**

Students will form small groups and present on a topic of your choice.

For the presentation, you MUST proceed in English and be on time for the presentation. If you miss your presentation, no make-up presentation is possible.

**5\. Midterm and Final Exam**

Absence from a class is no excuse for not knowing the assignment/exam. No make-up exam is allowed. Cheating on exams is absolutely forbidden.
